snippet: An N.Y.U. voice student who accumulated more than $70,000 in student loans transfers 30 miles north to a state campus and finds she can now pay her own way.
abstract: An N.Y.U. voice student who accumulated more than $70,000 in student loans transfers 30 miles north to a state campus and finds she can now pay her own way.

headline.main: Transferring to a State University, and Saving Tens of Thousands of Dollars in the Bargain
